MESSAGE.JP: いつものように、僕の部屋にみんなが集まって話をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Like any other evening, everyone was chatting away in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like any other evening, everyone was chatting away in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそれどころじゃなくて、恭介の作った資料から相手チームの力を分析しようと考え込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had more important things to do, as I was busy analyzing our opponents for the game, based on the data Kyousuke had collected.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had more important things to do, as I was busy analyzing our opponents for the game, based on the data Kyousuke had collected.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あのな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝By the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…人形劇をやることになったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...We're going to make a puppet show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...We're going to make a puppet show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声だけ聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard him speak, but didn't look at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard him speak, but didn't look at him.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでだよまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What is he going on about this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What is he going on about this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いやな…今度やる、近所の幼稚園での出し物のアイディアを聞かれてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You see... The local kindergarten was accepting ideas for a performance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You see... The local kindergarten was accepting ideas for a performance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それで人形劇はどうかと意見をしてみたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So I suggested a puppet show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So I suggested a puppet show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すると、是非にと返ってきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And they immediately agreed to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And they immediately agreed to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やらないわけにはいかないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How can we say no to them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How can we say no to them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふぅん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「で、いつだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, when will it be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, when will it be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「次の日曜」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Next Sunday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Next Sunday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「また急だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's so soon...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's so soon...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、その練習をな、今やろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why we're going to rehearse for it now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why we're going to rehearse for it now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ったく、またこいつは突拍子もない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You and your crazy ideas...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You and your crazy ideas...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、付き合いはするが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But, you can count me in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But, you can count me in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんな呼ぶとここじゃ狭いから、学食にするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's not enough room for everyone here, so let's move to the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's not enough room for everyone here, so let's move to the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴ、ぴ、ぴ…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Beep*, *beep*, *beep*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Beep*, *beep*, *beep*...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、メール送信完了。これでみんな集まる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, I emailed everyone. They're going to be there soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, I emailed everyone. They're going to be there soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、いくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, shall we go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, shall we go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「早くしろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hurry up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hurry up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なにやってんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's taking you so long?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's taking you so long?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「早く来いよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Get going already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Get going already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇぇーーっ!!　僕ですか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whaaaat!? Me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whaaaat!? Me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんでそんなたまげてるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you so surprised?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you so surprised?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、見てもらえればわかるように明日の試合に備えて、対策を練っている最中なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, as you can see, I'm busy developing tactics for tomorrow's game...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, as you can see, I'm busy developing tactics for tomorrow's game...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日の夜にしろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You can do that tomorrow evening.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You can do that tomorrow evening.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その時は試合終わってますから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The game will be over by then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The game will be over by then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいから、来いよ。みんなでやるんだから、誰ひとり欠けちゃならないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, let's go. Everyone is doing it, so no ducking out on this one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, let's go. Everyone is doing it, so no ducking out on this one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ＯＫ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は真人に担がれ、ボールペンだけ持って学食へと移されるのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was still holding my pen when Masato tossed me on his shoulders and hauled me to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was still holding my pen when Masato tossed me on his shoulders and hauled me to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「というわけで、人形劇の練習をこれより行う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So that's why we're going to rehearse for the puppet show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So that's why we're going to rehearse for the puppet show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んでなんで私らがそれをやることに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And why are we supposed to do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And why are we supposed to do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「地域の皆様との交流も…リトルバスターズの大切な仕事のひとつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Interacting with the good folks of the neighborhood... is another very important job for the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Interacting with the good folks of the neighborhood... is another very important job for the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私もいいと思うよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I think it's great～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I think it's great～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「楽しそうです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sounds like fun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sounds like fun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、異論はないな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Any objections, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Any objections, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、もうどうだっていいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I just don't care anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I just don't care anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、じゃあ全員納得したところで人形劇の準備を始めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, now that everyone's satisfied, let's start preparations for the show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, now that everyone's satisfied, let's start preparations for the show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんにもないんだが、いいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But we don't have anything, are you sure about this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But we don't have anything, are you sure about this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「まあ、なんとかやってみようよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We'll deal with that somehow～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We'll deal with that somehow～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まったくだ。今日中に終わらせれば何の問題もない。小毬はよくわかってるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Exactly. If we get it all ready today, there's no problem. Komari understands perfectly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Exactly. If we get it all ready today, there's no problem. Komari understands perfectly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんは状況ってものがまったく見えてないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't think Komari-san understands the situation we're in at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't think Komari-san understands the situation we're in at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「脚本は決まっていないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Have you decided on the scenario yet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Have you decided on the scenario yet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ん？　いや、特には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mm? No, not in particular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mm? No, not in particular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、そんな事もあろうかとこの私自ら筆を取ってみた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I saw this coming so I threw something together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I saw this coming so I threw something together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 原稿用紙を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out a pile of paper sheets.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out a pile of paper sheets.

MESSAGE.JP: …もう、いつの間にとかツッコむのはやめよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I figured that asking when she had time to prepare that would be useless...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I figured that asking when she had time to prepare that would be useless...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…人形劇用なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is it suitable for a puppet show?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is it suitable for a puppet show?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おお、姉御がどんな話作ったか興味ありますネっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ooh, I can't wait to hear what kind of story Anego wrote.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ooh, I can't wait to hear what kind of story Anego wrote.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ…プロローグはこうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu... The prologue goes like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu... The prologue goes like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「『ジュルリ…夜の街に湿った音が響き渡る…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛Slurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛Slurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待った、ストップ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, that's enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, that's enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、一文でいきなりダメ出しか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What exactly wasn't to your liking in the very first sentence, already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What exactly wasn't to your liking in the very first sentence, already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…最初の四文字でダメ出しするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... The very first word is no good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... The very first word is no good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ジュルリか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You mean slurp?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You mean slurp?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…子供向けでお願い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No R-rated material, please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No R-rated material, please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というか、この人があの書き出しをすると、サイコホラーかインモラルにしか行かないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I have a feeling that if we work from this kind of prologue, it'll be either a psychological horror show or something indecent.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have a feeling that if we work from this kind of prologue, it'll be either a psychological horror show or something indecent.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…まずその怪しい雰囲気を払拭すべきかと思いますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...The first thing we have to do is get rid of the suspicious atmosphere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...The first thing we have to do is get rid of the suspicious atmosphere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー、そこに味があるのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeh, but that's what makes it so exquisite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeh, but that's what makes it so exquisite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「味があっても子供泣くか教育に悪いものになるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if it's exquisite, it won't be very educational if it makes the kids cry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if it's exquisite, it won't be very educational if it makes the kids cry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、ちゅるりにすればかわいいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's change it to ❛schlurp❜ then～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's change it to ❛schlurp❜ then～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 語感だけで決めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She only thought about how it sounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: She only thought about how it sounds.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほど。そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Great. Let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Great. Let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「『ちゅるり…夜の街に湿った音が響き渡る…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛Schlurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛Schlurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「えろくないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's not sexy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's not sexy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わからないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I have no idea what you're saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I have no idea what you're saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「小毬君、読んでみてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Komari-kun, you try reading it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Komari-kun, you try reading it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　うん、おっけーだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Yeah, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Yeah, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「『ちゅるり…夜の街に湿った音が響き渡る…』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝❛Schlurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝❛Schlurp... A damp sound echoed across the sleeping town...❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「えろい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now that's sexy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now that's sexy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ダメそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The situation looked hopeless.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The situation looked hopeless.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「悪くないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Not bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Not bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、悪いと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, I think it is bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, I think it is bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「わがままだなキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're too selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're too selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあいい。あとは恭介氏に任せるとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But alright. Let's leave the rest to Mr. Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But alright. Let's leave the rest to Mr. Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、最初はそのつもりだったからな。問題はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, I knew it'd come to this. I have no complaints.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, I knew it'd come to this. I have no complaints.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、まずは人形を用意しないとな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, we have to prepare dolls for starters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, we have to prepare dolls for starters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すごいよね…全くゼロからのスタートじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Incredible... We have to start from literally nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Incredible... We have to start from literally nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今から縫って作っている時間はないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We have no time to make them from scratch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We have no time to make them from scratch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まず、各自自室を当たってみてくれ。何か使えるものがあるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Try looking around in your rooms, there might be something useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Try looking around in your rooms, there might be something useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺はその間、脚本を練っておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm gonna work on the scenario in the meantime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm gonna work on the scenario in the meantime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういうと、恭介は懐からなにやらノートとシャーペンを取り出し、どっかと椅子に腰を落ち着けた。
MESSAGE.EN: With that said, he produced a notebook and pencil from somewhere in his pockets and dropped into a chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that said, he produced a notebook and pencil from somewhere in his pockets and dropped into a chair.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんな話にするか決まってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you decide on the story?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you decide on the story?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、いわゆるおとぎ話調で行ってみようと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I'm thinking of something along the lines of a fairytale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I'm thinking of something along the lines of a fairytale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「書き出しはこうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It starts like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It starts like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あるところに、おじいさんとおばあさんが住んでいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Once upon a time there was an old man and woman.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Once upon a time there was an old man and woman.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おじいさんは山に芝刈りに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The old man was cutting crops on the mountain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The old man was cutting crops on the mountain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おばあさんは川でテンタクルスと死闘を繰り広げ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The old woman was engaged in a deathly battle with Tentaclus by the riverside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The old woman was engaged in a deathly battle with Tentaclus by the riverside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「てんたくるすってなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's this Tentaclus?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's this Tentaclus?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんかでっかいイカのモンスターじゃなかったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Something like a huge squid monster, I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Something like a huge squid monster, I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…その方向はボツでお願い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... Please, nothing of this sort...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... Please, nothing of this sort...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「え、ダメか？　面白くね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What, you don't like that? Isn't it interesting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What, you don't like that? Isn't it interesting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 想像してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I allowed my imagination to run rampant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I allowed my imagination to run rampant.

MESSAGE.JP: `イカ@「プルグァアァァーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Squid@❝Blaaargh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Squid@❝Blaaargh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばあさん@「はーーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandmother@❝Take thaaat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandmother@❝Take thaaat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 洗濯で鍛えたおばあさんの拳が、でっかいイカの触手を引き裂く!!
MESSAGE.EN: The old woman uses her fists, tempered by years of hard work doing laundry, to tear Squid's tentacles apart!
MESSAGE.Translation: The old woman uses her fists, tempered by years of hard work doing laundry, to tear Squid's tentacles apart!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメダメっ!!　おばあさん強すぎでシュールすぎるから!!　子供泣くよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Out of the question! She's too strong, that's just too surreal! Kids will cry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Out of the question! She's too strong, that's just too surreal! Kids will cry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、ちょっとした冗談さ。真面目に考えるとするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I was just kidding. Now I'm going to start thinking seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I was just kidding. Now I'm going to start thinking seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ＯＫ出てたら、絶対そのままでいくつもりだったんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm so sure he'd have gone with this scenario if there were no objections...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm so sure he'd have gone with this scenario if there were no objections...

MESSAGE.JP: …というわけで、全員部屋に戻って、持ち物を確認してみることに。
MESSAGE.EN: So, all of us returned to our respective rooms to look for something useful.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, all of us returned to our respective rooms to look for something useful.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らの部屋でそんなもんあるわけないけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no way something like that would be in our room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no way something like that would be in our room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Actually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Actually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鉄アレイとダンベルの友情を描いたストーリーというのはどうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about a story of friendship between a Kettlebell and a Dumbbell?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about a story of friendship between a Kettlebell and a Dumbbell?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ダンベル…もういい、俺はここに置いていってくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dumbbell... That's it for me, just leave me here please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dumbbell... That's it for me, just leave me here please...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わかってたんだ…みんなの重荷になってるってこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I always knew... I knew that I would just drag everyone down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I always knew... I knew that I would just drag everyone down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんなこと言うなよ鉄アレイ…オレのほうがもっと重荷になってんだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't say that, Kettlebell... Wasn't I the biggest burden on everyone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't say that, Kettlebell... Wasn't I the biggest burden on everyone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ…なにそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good Lord... What the heck is that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good Lord... What the heck is that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性陣に頼るしかないなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's up to the girls now...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's up to the girls now...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ぬいぐるみがあったから持ってきたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I had a plushie so I brought it with me～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I had a plushie so I brought it with me～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私も持って来ましたっ。ぐりずるさんですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I brought one, too. Meet Mr. Grizzly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I brought one, too. Meet Mr. Grizzly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんがぺんぎんのぬいぐるみ、クドが灰色熊のぬいぐるみをそれぞれテーブルに置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san brought a stuffed penguin toy and Kud brought a stuffed grizzly toy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san brought a stuffed penguin toy and Kud brought a stuffed grizzly toy.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぬいぐるみじゃ演技できねえだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We can't perform with stuffed toys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We can't perform with stuffed toys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、ここはおねーさんに任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, leave it to Onee-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, leave it to Onee-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「手を入れて動かすタイプの物になら、容易に加工できる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They can easily be modified so that you can put your hand inside and move them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They can easily be modified so that you can put your hand inside and move them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうなのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、まずぬいぐるみの下の辺りにズバっと切り込みを入れてだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, first you have to slit the bottom part open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, first you have to slit the bottom part open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「その穴から中のワタをずるずると引きずり出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You then draw all the cotton out of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You then draw all the cotton out of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「後はそこに手を突っ込み…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then you can thrust your hand...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then you can thrust your hand...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うああああーーーーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, uaaaahn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, uaaaahn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…小毬さんがかなり泣き入ってるからその辺りにしてあげて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... Komari-san is really starting to cry, so leave it at that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... Komari-san is really starting to cry, so leave it at that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐりずるさんはずたずたにしちゃダメなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You can't tear Mr. Grizzly apart...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You can't tear Mr. Grizzly apart...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか…今ちょうどそのふたつを使った脚本を思いついたんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Too bad... I just thought up a story involving those two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Too bad... I just thought up a story involving those two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちょっとした訓戒も含んだ、いわゆる寓話系の話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It even has a moral to it, something like a fable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It even has a moral to it, something like a fable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…どんなのだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What is it like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What is it like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「タイトルは…あかぺんぎんちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Title is... Little Red Riding Penguin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Title is... Little Red Riding Penguin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あるひ、あかぺんぎんちゃんが森を歩いていると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝One day, a little penguin was going through a forest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝One day, a little penguin was going through a forest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ぐりずるさんに出会い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He ran into grizzly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He ran into grizzly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ニヤピクシャキーンッ!!　ガブッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Bwaaarghh!! Gauu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Bwaaarghh!! Gauu!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「食われた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And was eaten.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And was eaten.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The End.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The End.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふるふるふるふる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, no, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, no, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふるふるふるふる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No, no, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No, no, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ふたりで首をぶんぶん横に振っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The two of them shook their heads frantically.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The two of them shook their heads frantically.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや小毬さんとクドが本当に泣いてるからその辺にしてあげて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san and Kud are really crying, so leave it at that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san and Kud are really crying, so leave it at that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「冗談はさておき、廃品のぬいぐるみでも加工するならいいんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Enough joking, why don't we use throw-away toys instead?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Enough joking, why don't we use throw-away toys instead?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たしか演劇部に人形劇用の舞台があったはずだから、それも借りてこよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If I'm not mistaken, the drama club had a stage for puppet shows, so we can borrow that too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If I'm not mistaken, the drama club had a stage for puppet shows, so we can borrow that too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、それぞれ知り合いなどに当たって、いらなくなったぬいぐるみを集めてくることになった。
MESSAGE.EN: So, we went to ask our friends whether they had stuffed toys they didn't need.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, we went to ask our friends whether they had stuffed toys they didn't need.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…さすがに集まらんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I didn't hope to find anything to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I didn't hope to find anything to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Me neither...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Me neither...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも、男子でぬいぐるみを持っている人自体がなかなか見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a daunting task to try and find guys who had any stuffed toys at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a daunting task to try and find guys who had any stuffed toys at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、こんなんもらってきたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, look what I got.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, look what I got.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、見つかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you found something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you found something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …軍人ジョー人形だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a Soldier Joe doll.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a Soldier Joe doll.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「集まるには集まったが、また微妙なラインナップだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We did find something, but the line-up is pretty weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We did find something, but the line-up is pretty weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 机の上に並んでいるぬいぐるみを眺めながら、来ヶ谷さんが呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She muttered, eyeing the stuffed toys lined up atop the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: She muttered, eyeing the stuffed toys lined up atop the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: $K103タヌキ$K0とウサギのぬいぐるみ、軍人ジョー、それにエイリアンの人形の４つらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a $K103tanuki$K0 and rabbit stuffed toy, Soldier Joe doll and an alien doll.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a $K103tanuki$K0 and rabbit stuffed toy, Soldier Joe doll and an alien doll.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、タヌキとウサギだけで話を作ったほうがいいんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should make a story with just the tanuki and rabbit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should make a story with just the tanuki and rabbit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、全部使う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, we'll use everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, we'll use everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「せっかくみんなで集めたもんだ。ここはやはり使って然るべき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should respect everyone's work and use everything we managed to scrounge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should respect everyone's work and use everything we managed to scrounge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どんな話になるのか想像がつかないんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can't imagine what kind of story it's going to be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can't imagine what kind of story it's going to be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いい感じにサプライズが出てくるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Full of pleasant surprises.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Full of pleasant surprises.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だいたい、それくらいキャラがいないと面白くないしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Besides, if there aren't at least that many characters, it won't be interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Besides, if there aren't at least that many characters, it won't be interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、確かにそういうのはあるけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't say you don't have a point, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't say you don't have a point, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、実はもう大体脚本は作ってあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, to be honest, I already came up with the scenario.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, to be honest, I already came up with the scenario.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どの人形をどの役に割り振るかを決めてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You need to decide which doll will be playing which role.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You need to decide which doll will be playing which role.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？　どんな役があるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmmm? What roles are there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm? What roles are there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「主人公にその奥さん、友達と…悪役」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Protagonist, his wife, his friend... and the villain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Protagonist, his wife, his friend... and the villain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「タヌキさんが、主人公がいいです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Tanuki should be the protagonist～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Tanuki should be the protagonist～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「賛成～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Agreed～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Agreed～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 奥さんは…。
MESSAGE.EN: His wife will be...
MESSAGE.Translation: His wife will be...

MESSAGE.JP: 主人公の友達は…。
MESSAGE.EN: His friend will be...
MESSAGE.Translation: His friend will be...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「残りが悪役、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The last one will be the villain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The last one will be the villain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、それでいいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ一番無難な線じゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's the safest path.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's the safest path.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「結構ちゃんとした話が作れそうっスね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sounds like we can make a decent story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sounds like we can make a decent story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…いや、その斜め上を行くのが恭介だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...God only knows what Kyousuke is going to turn it into...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...God only knows what Kyousuke is going to turn it into...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、確かにそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, that's true...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, that's true...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いいかどうかは微妙なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's hard to say if it's going to be good or bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's hard to say if it's going to be good or bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そもそもジョーは奥さんになれるんでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝First of all, can Joe really become the wife...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝First of all, can Joe really become the wife...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ見た目こんなだが、実は美少女だったという設定でいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's assume that despite his look he's actually a beautiful girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's assume that despite his look he's actually a beautiful girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ふたりの馴れ初めは気の合う友達だと思ってたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They started as friends with similar interests...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They started as friends with similar interests...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「『お、おまえっ、実は…女だったのかよーーっ!!!』から始まった恋だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And their love began with ❛Y, you... were a girl all along!?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And their love began with ❛Y, you... were a girl all along!?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、恭介がそれでいいならいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, if you're okay with that, Kyousuke, why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, if you're okay with that, Kyousuke, why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「疑問なんだが、エイリアンに性別はあるのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝One doubt I have, do aliens even have a gender...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝One doubt I have, do aliens even have a gender...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「子供ができたらステキな家族になりそうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If they had kids, it'd be a great family.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If they had kids, it'd be a great family.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「休日には未確認飛行物体で宇宙旅行ですよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Would they use a UFO to go on holiday trips?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Would they use a UFO to go on holiday trips?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…なんかほのぼのしてるんだか怪しさ満点だかわからないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... It sounds like a heartwarming story, but I'm not sure about the paranormal aspect...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... It sounds like a heartwarming story, but I'm not sure about the paranormal aspect...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「夜は…墓場で運動会…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝When night falls... A sports meet at the graveyard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝When night falls... A sports meet at the graveyard...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いい感じかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm starting to like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm starting to like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …西園さんの思考はいまいちよくわからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her thought process was still a mystery to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her thought process was still a mystery to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「このタヌキは、どうやってエイリアンと友達になったんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How did tanuki become friends with the alien...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How did tanuki become friends with the alien...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なあに、そこはそれ、メルヘンだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, it's just a fairy-tale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, it's just a fairy-tale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ジョーとエイリアンが一緒にいる時点で、すでにメルヘンとは地球とアンドロメダ星雲くらいかけ離れてると思うんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Joe being together with an alien already makes it as far from a fairy-tale as Earth is from Andromeda.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Joe being together with an alien already makes it as far from a fairy-tale as Earth is from Andromeda.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あとこれ、どう考えても奥さんと友達に悪役が瞬殺されそうなんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, no matter how you look at it, the wife and the friend will kill the villain in the blink of an eye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, no matter how you look at it, the wife and the friend will kill the villain in the blink of an eye.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, let's use stuff from the plastic modeling club to turn rabbit into a mecha-rabbit.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...We stuck a V-shaped antenna on the rabbit's forehead.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's cool～.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let's attach a bazooka on his back and a missile pod on his shoulder.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, blunt weapons and explosives.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Rabbit turned so wicked all of a sudden...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let's change the story a bit to conform to the characters.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, time for casting roles.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, no objections here.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haru-chan, good luck～!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do your best.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then I... Yeah, something with a lot of intense action scenes.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And make sure I get a lot of manly lines.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Or rather, why would you need a tree in a puppet show! There's no need for that role!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You need to make rustling sounds to set the atmosphere. Do it as manfully as you wish.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Take care of the intense action scene of blowing leaves too.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You need to make rustling sounds to set the atmosphere. Do it as manfully as you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You need to make rustling sounds to set the atmosphere. Do it as manfully as you wish.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Take care of the intense action scene of blowing leaves too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Take care of the intense action scene of blowing leaves too.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So that part doesn't change after all!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, okay... Let's draw lots.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Got it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Awesome! Tanuki, tanuki!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, you can take it easy.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to prepare something for drawing lots.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, I saw this coming so I already prepared everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, I saw this coming so I already prepared everything.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Let's not even get into that.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, did everyone pick one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、これ何も書いてないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, there's nothing written on mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, there's nothing written on mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それはハズレだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's a miss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's a miss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、じゃあ僕は役無しか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I don't get any role...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I don't get any role...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「裏方に回れということだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It means you'll be working behind the scenes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It means you'll be working behind the scenes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、そういうこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真っ白に燃え尽きていた。
MESSAGE.EN: His face turned white.
MESSAGE.Translation: His face turned white.

MESSAGE.JP: その手のクジには、たった一字。
MESSAGE.EN: He was holding a piece of paper with just one word on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was holding a piece of paper with just one word on it.

MESSAGE.EN: ...❛Tree.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛Tree.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それがおまえの運命なんだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is your destiny...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is your destiny...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか、なんでわざわざ木までクジに入ってるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm more interested in why there's even one for the ❛Tree❜ at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm more interested in why there's even one for the ❛Tree❜ at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、決まったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, it's decided.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, it's decided.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがすでに人形をスタンバイしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was already waiting with a doll.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was already waiting with a doll.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「お、やる気まんまんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, you look full of enthusiasm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, you look full of enthusiasm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それほどでもないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's just your imagination.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's just your imagination.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、台本これな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, here's the script.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, here's the script.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 早速人形を手に、借りてきた舞台の裏に回る。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand inside the doll and went behind the stage we'd borrowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand inside the doll and went behind the stage we'd borrowed.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ワレワレハウチュウジンデアル」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝I AM AN ALIEN.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝I AM AN ALIEN.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「キシャーッ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Kishaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Kishaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「あなた、夕飯できたっス！　サー、イエッサー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Honey, I prepared dinner! Sir, yes sir!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Honey, I prepared dinner! Sir, yes sir!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「今日はハンバーグですから！　自分頑張ったっス！　恐縮っス！　撃ち方、止めいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝I made a hamburger today! I tried real hard! Will be my honor! Cease fire!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝I made a hamburger today! I tried real hard! Will be my honor! Cease fire!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今人形動かしてたのは西園だよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It was Nishizono who was moving the doll just now, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It was Nishizono who was moving the doll just now, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, you are correct.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, you are correct.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もう一度やりましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Let me try one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Let me try one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 裏に回る。
MESSAGE.EN: She went back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went back.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ワレワレハアンドロメダカラキマシタヨロシク」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝I COME FROM ANDROMEDA NICE TO MEET YOU.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝I COME FROM ANDROMEDA NICE TO MEET YOU.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「キシャァー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Kishaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Kishaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「あなた、お風呂が沸いたっス！　サー、イエッサー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Honey, I warmed up the bath for you! Sir, yes sir!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Honey, I warmed up the bath for you! Sir, yes sir!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「きっちり４１℃ですから！　完璧に適温っス！　恐縮っス！　行軍、始めいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝The temperature is precisely 41 degrees Celsius! Can't get more perfect than that! Will be my honor! Fire in the hole!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝The temperature is precisely 41 degrees Celsius! Can't get more perfect than that! Will be my honor! Fire in the hole!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「すげえ…別人が裏にいるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Amazing... There's someone else in there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Amazing... There's someone else in there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これは本当にみおちんなんですかね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Is that really Mio-chin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Is that really Mio-chin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなビビるくらいの実力だった!!
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was dumbfounded by her performing skills!
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was dumbfounded by her performing skills!

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…いけませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Was it bad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Was it bad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「みおちゃんすごいうまーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mio-chan, you're amazingly good!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mio-chan, you're amazingly good!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「びっくりしました～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I couldn't believe my ears!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I couldn't believe my ears!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、それほどでもないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Oh no, you're exaggerating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Oh no, you're exaggerating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …西園さん、なんか色々よくわかんないこと上手いな…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Nishizono-san was good at the oddest things...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Nishizono-san was good at the oddest things...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いい劇になりそうだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I have a feeling it'll be a great show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I have a feeling it'll be a great show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ようしっ、私もがんばるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, I'm gonna give it everything I've got.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, I'm gonna give it everything I've got.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあみんな、各自自分の仕事を頑張ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well then, everyone get to your respective tasks and get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well then, everyone get to your respective tasks and get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その日は、そのまま夜遅くまでみんなで練習をした。
MESSAGE.EN: That day we rehearsed until it was late in the evening.
MESSAGE.Translation: That day we rehearsed until it was late in the evening.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…仕上がってきたな。そろそろ上がるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Things are looking good. Let's call it a day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Things are looking good. Let's call it a day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I agree.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I agree.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はあー、人形劇だから後ろで台本見ながらできるのが救いですネ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sigh, I'm glad it's a puppet show and I can read the script behind the stage...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sigh, I'm glad it's a puppet show and I can read the script behind the stage...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすが主人公はセリフが多いっスヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The main character has so many lines.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The main character has so many lines.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「アドリブは控えてくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No improvisation please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No improvisation please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやいや、やはり役者魂としては、そこが重要ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh no, improvisation is everything for an actress such as myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh no, improvisation is everything for an actress such as myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、ぶち壊しにならない程度にね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, just make sure you don't ruin the show completely...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, just make sure you don't ruin the show completely...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「フォローも大変です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It'll be difficult to back you up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It'll be difficult to back you up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに西園さんはダントツに上手く、演技指導にまで回っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Incidentally, Nishizono-san's acting was impeccable and she even helped others with their roles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Incidentally, Nishizono-san's acting was impeccable and she even helped others with their roles.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、あとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, what's remaining is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Alright, what's remaining is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …言いかけたところで、恭介の携帯に着信が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was about to say something but a phone call interrupted him.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was about to say something but a phone call interrupted him.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もしもし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ええ、順調ですよ。明日には十分…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, things are going well. Tomorrow we'll be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, things are going well. Tomorrow we'll be...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Huh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Huh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すみません、もう一回」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, can you repeat that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry, can you repeat that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだか雲行きが怪しくなってきたぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm having a terrible feeling about this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm having a terrible feeling about this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「つまり…別に俺らが出なくてもいいってことですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You mean... we don't have to show up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You mean... we don't have to show up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにいーーーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whaaaaaaaat!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whaaaaaaaat!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわ、なんか最悪の展開が…。
MESSAGE.EN: The worst outcome possible...
MESSAGE.Translation: The worst outcome possible...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…というわけで、俺たちの人形劇は無期延期となった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...As you heard, our puppet show is postponed indefinitely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...As you heard, our puppet show is postponed indefinitely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えええーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whaaaat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whaaaat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何のために頑張ったんですか私たちっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What did we do all this work for!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What did we do all this work for!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「正直、すまん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの木も板についてきたところじゃねえかっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I finally mastered my role as a tree, dammit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I finally mastered my role as a tree, dammit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ここまでやったのにもったいないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We tried so hard and this all goes to waste～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We tried so hard and this all goes to waste～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「何とかして私たちも出させてもらえないかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Can you pull some strings to let us perform...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Can you pull some strings to let us perform...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、そこだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…秋にもう一度こういう催し物があるから、そのときに是非ってことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...They'll be doing the same thing in the fall and they told me they'd be happy if we performed then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...They'll be doing the same thing in the fall and they told me they'd be happy if we performed then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…ずいぶん早い準備になったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...That's quite some preliminary preparations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...That's quite some preliminary preparations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、来ヶ谷のその考え方はいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's a good way to put it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's a good way to put it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「また秋に、もうちょいパワーアップした俺たちの劇を披露してやろうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we'll become even better by fall and will make the best show ever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we'll become even better by fall and will make the best show ever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まったく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Goodness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Goodness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…考えなし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Don't even want to think about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Don't even want to think about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now, now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now, now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それまでに美魚さんに弟子入りしておくのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I will train under Mio-san～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I will train under Mio-san～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「弟子でしか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Train you... under me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Train you... under me?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…噛んだだけですが何か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I just slipped up, didn't I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I just slipped up, didn't I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…別に誰もツッコんでないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no... No one said anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no... No one said anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「秋かぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fall, huh～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fall, huh～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…うん、またがんばろー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Yep, let's give it our best shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Yep, let's give it our best shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、そういうことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, we'll have to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, we'll have to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ひとまず、今日は片付けをして解散になった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We cleaned up after ourselves and went back to our rooms.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We cleaned up after ourselves and went back to our rooms.
